attributes.action: Ensure the police enforce the Road Traffic Acts in respect of cyclists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a car driver and a cyclist I see many instances when cyclists ignore the Highway Code and the Road Traffic Acts. I site lack of lights at night, cycling on pavements and failing to observe traffic signals as prime examples.
It is time the police used their powers to ensure that transgressing cyclists are prosecuted in the same manner as car drivers when they are observed to be breaking the law
